# ARSCNDebugOptions

**Type Alias**

Options for drawing overlay content to aid debugging of AR tracking in a SceneKit view.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ARSCNDebugOptions = SCNDebugOptions
```

## Discussion

To use these debugging overlays, add them to the option set in the view’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/scenekit/scnscenerenderer/1523281-debugoptions] property (inherited from the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView] class).
title: ARSCNDebugOptions
